input_text:
Job Title: Azure Data Architect

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Title: Azure Data ArchitectLocation: Roseville, CA (Remote)Duration: Full time /ContractNote: H1T is also fine
Client : WinWire/Adventist Health  JD/Description of Role*Primary Skills:Strong understanding of emerging cloud technologies and standards. Strong knowledge of Data Modelling, Data migration, Data Ingestion, automation technologiesStrong knowledge of SQL programming, Data Lake, PostgreSQL, ADFDesign and implement cloud solutions, working to agreed standards and principles.Should have experience in designing, developing, testing, and deploying cloud-based applications and services using Azure technologies, including Service Fabric.Hands on experience in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and SOLID principles.Knowledge on code review tools and techniques would be preferred.Creating and maintaining technical documentation, including design documents and runbooks.Mentoring and coaching junior developers and other team members.Ability to learn new concepts and carry out technical research. Demonstrated ability to gain consensus in a diverse working group that may involve both IT and business leaders across multiple disciplines. Demonstrated ability work on diverse technical, and complex projects to completion.Strong communication skills, collaborating across diverse functional teams. Experience drafting and delivering communications to ensure full transparency within all levels of the business. Achievement oriented with the ability to be flexible and adaptive daily.Excellent problem-solving skills with a structured thinking process.Job Description:Define best practices and work breakdown structure.Author Solution Definition and design (including High Level Architecture).Collaborate with Project manager to finalize Sprint execution plan.Author Detailed deployment document.Guide the application development team to implement the solution based on the design.Review and provide suggestions on User manual post implementation.Review and Validate Test cases and Test PlanPrimary Skills Must Have:Strong understanding of emerging cloud technologies and standards. Strong knowledge of Data Modelling, Data migration, Data Ingestion, automation technologiesStrong knowledge of SQL programming, Data Lake, PostgreSQL, ADFDesign and implement cloud solutions, working to agreed standards and principles.Should have experience in designing, developing, testing, and deploying cloud-based applications and services using Azure technologies, including Service Fabric.Hands on experience in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and SOLID principles.Knowledge on code review tools and techniques would be preferred.Creating and maintaining technical documentation, including design documents and runbooks.Mentoring and coaching junior developers and other team members.Ability to learn new concepts and carry out technical research. Demonstrated ability to gain consensus in a diverse working group that may involve both IT and business leaders across multiple disciplines. Demonstrated ability work on diverse technical, and complex projects to completion.Strong communication skills, collaborating across diverse functional teams. Experience drafting and delivering communications to ensure full transparency within all levels of the business. Achievement oriented with the ability to be flexible and adaptive daily.Excellent problem-solving skills with a structured thinking process.  Education Qualifications : BE

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Azure Data Architect
output_json.summary:
Job Title: Azure Data Architect
Location: Roseville, CA (Remote)
Employment Type: full-time
required_skills: Strong understanding of emerging cloud technologies and standards
Strong knowledge of Data Modelling, Data migration, Data Ingestion, automation technologies
Strong knowledge of SQL programming, Data Lake, PostgreSQL, ADF
Design and implement cloud solutions, working to agreed standards and principles
Experience in designing, developing, testing, and deploying cloud-based applications and services using Azure technologies, including Service Fabric
Hands on experience in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and SOLID principles
Knowledge on code review tools and techniques
Mentoring and coaching junior developers and other team members
Ability to learn new concepts and carry out technical research
Achievement oriented with the ability to be flexible and adaptive daily
Excellent problem-solving skills with a structured thinking process
job_responsibilities: Define best practices and work breakdown structure
Author Solution Definition and design (including High Level Architecture)
Collaborate with Project manager to finalize Sprint execution plan
Guide the application development team to implement the solution based on the design
Review and provide suggestions on User manual post implementation
Review and Validate Test cases and Test Plan
